git.commitMessage:
fix: Restrict team swap to teammates only

Fixed two issues with position swapping in team selection:

Issue 1: Swap button showed for all players (cross-team swaps allowed)
- Frontend: Swap button now only shows for players on same team
- Team 1 players: swap button only if currentPlayer.teamId === 1
- Team 2 players: swap button only if currentPlayer.teamId === 2

Issue 2: Backend didn't validate team membership during swap
- Added validation in validatePositionSwap() function
- Now checks: initiator.teamId !== target.teamId
- Returns error: "Can only swap positions with teammates"

Why this matters:
- Prevents confusion from cross-team position swaps
- Ensures logical game setup (teammates swap within team)
- Fixes reported bug: "can't add bots after swapping teams"
  (was caused by swapping with opponent team players)

Changes:
- frontend/src/components/TeamSelection.tsx: Team-specific swap visibility
- backend/src/game/validation.ts: Added team membership check

Result: Swap button only appears for your teammates, and backend
enforces this rule with proper error messages.
